verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bring forth the dawn,
For the time has now come
That all mourning and weeping be cast away.
Create anew as You speak forth the word,
For we’re pressing into a new day.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Shout at the walls that stand in your way
And rejoice as you see them fall.
Lift up your eyes and behold a new day
Where we live by a trumpet call.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O sons, rejoice for the word has now come
That will bind and will loose and will set you free.
Leave all behind, for the word has now come
That will create a purity.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Bring down the faith that contains a new age
And displaces the vision of yesterday,
New expectations are filling our hearts
For we’re pressing into a new day.
